scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --prefix shared && npm install --prefix server && npm install --prefix client
scripts.start:dev-tasks: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix shared" "npm run dev --prefix server" "npm run dev --prefix client"
scripts.dev:all: npm run build:shared && npm run start:dev-tasks
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && npm run clean --prefix shared && npm run clean --prefix server && npm run clean --prefix client
